mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rt.RV_CODE, rt.RV_CONTENT, rt.RV_DATE, rt.RV_LIKE, rt.RV_STAR, rt.P_CODE, prt.RVP_PSIZE, prt.RVP_PNAME, prt.RVP_SPNAME, prt.RVP_PPATH, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY rt.RV_LIKE DESC) AS rn FROM review_test rt JOIN photo_review_test prt ON rt.RV_CODE = prt.RV_CODE ) sub WHERE sub.rn BETWEEN #{firstNum} AND #{endNum}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM review_test
